JobFullDesc: Every once in a while a job comes along with an opportunity to be at forefront of a brand new business. If you have been waiting for that kind of opportunity this may be the job for you.We are the Dynamics 365 Fraud Protection and Supply Chain visibility team. Our modern anti-fraud and supply chain platform is a unique combination of the cutting edge research in distributed systems, machine learning and operations research.We are a startup like and a fast paced mentality, our motto is to work on interesting things, grow, learn and have fun doing it :) You will work with smart people who care deeply about creating a fun and supportive workplace, and you will have an incredible opportunity to learn and grow.Our team is in charge of a foundational service which enables organizations build secure platforms for buying and selling goods online. Many of Microsoft’s key businesses has been relying on our services 24x7 every day for many years - Windows Store, Microsoft Store, Xbox, Office 365, Azure, Dynamics, Bing Ads and Microsoft Rewards, to name just a few. This year we made our technology available to partners outside of Microsoft and their customers.Our team is also in charge of building a foundational service enabling organizations worldwide, efficiently organize and manage their supply chain networks spanning across multiple partners and suppliers.We are looking for a self-motivated software engineer/ technical lead who is proficient in creating and maintaining warm and productive work relationships, a go getter and a fast learner. We evaluate and experiment with new technology every day and as such, for candidates being passionate about technology overall, having a deep understanding of fundamentals and embracing a continuous learning is more important than prior experience with a particular technology.ResponsibilitiesWe are searching for future Microsoft leaders who want to push state of art on one or more of the following:Advanced Supply chain network management solutions and algorithmsAdvanced fraud solutions and algorithmsDistributed systems and storageMachine Learning and Anomaly DetectionExtreme performance and low latency systemsSystem ML, learned Indexes, sketches Being a part of the team, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing and deploying to production new features of the product platform. You will be working with the project management team to review and evaluate customer scenarios, and then work with other software engineers and data scientists to come up with designs to implement the requirements. You will also be responsible for monitoring services in production, proactively detecting, investigating and mitigating issues to ensure best quality of service for our customers.QualificationsBasic
